nodes.text: Muglund was a male Gamorrean member of the White Maw pirate gang during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he and Reneget Vause were confronted by a bounty hunter on Hoth. Vause refused to fight an "unworthy" opponent and left, leaving Muglund alone. After being defeated, Muglund begged for his life, offering to tell Hunter Vauses's location if the Hunter let him go.
Muglund appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission on Hoth.
